1.0.1.name: wordpress/ebibleicious
1.0.1.description:
eBible.com is a Web 2.0 Bible site that can be instantly integrated into your WordPress blog with this plugin. After installing and configuring the plugin options you just continue blogging and all posts past, present and future with Bible references in them will be linked to eBible.com.

On page load javascript is used to bring your scripture references to life.

See http://ebible.com/tookit/developers for more information on eBibleicious which this plugin uses
